metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17044 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing HVM guest OS users to cause a denial of service (infinite loop and host OS hang) by leveraging the mishandling of Populate on Demand (PoD) errors.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
